## Description

This page explores the relationship between life expectancy and GDP per capita.

## Analysis

```{python}
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

# Load the dataset
gapminder = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

# Set the visual style
sns.set_theme(style="whitegrid")

# Create the scatter plot
plt.figure(figsize=(9, 6))
sns.scatterplot(
    data=gapminder, 
    x="gdp_per_capita", 
    y="life_expectancy", 
    hue="continent", 
    alpha=0.7,
    palette="viridis"
)



# Add labels and title
plt.title("Life Expectancy vs. GDP per Capita (1952-2007)", fontsize=14)
plt.xlabel("GDP per Capita (Log Scale)", fontsize=12)
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy (Years)", fontsize=12)

# Display the plot
plt.show()
```
